an3.141:4.1: * “Tayo ca, bhikkhave, assaparasse desessāmi tayo ca purisaparasse.
an3.141:4.2: Taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an3.141:4.3: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
an3.141:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco assaparasso javasampanno hoti;
an3.141:5.4: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco assaparasso javasampanno hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca;
an3.141:5.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco assaparasso javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an3.141:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco purisaparasso javasampanno hoti;
an3.141:6.4: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco purisaparasso javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca;
an3.141:6.6: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco purisaparasso javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
an3.141:7.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
an3.141:7.5: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye pañhaṃ puṭṭho saṃsādeti, no vissajjeti.
an3.141:7.9: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, purisaparasso javasampanno hoti;
an3.141:8.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, purisaparasso javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca, na ārohapariṇāhasampanno?
an3.141:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
an3.141:8.4: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye pañhaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeti, no saṃsādeti.
an3.141:8.8: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, purisaparasso javasampanno ca hoti;
an3.141:9.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, purisaparasso javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca?
an3.141:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
an3.141:9.4: Abhidhamme kho pana abhivinaye pañhaṃ puṭṭho vissajjeti, no saṃsādeti.
an3.141:9.8: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, purisaparasso javasampanno ca hoti vaṇṇasampanno ca ārohapariṇāhasampanno ca.
